org.simalliance.openmobileapi

Class SERecognizerByAID

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SERecognizer
      • org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SERecognizerByAID

  • public class SERecognizerByAID
extends SERecognizer
    Instances of this class can be used to find a Secure Element implementing a specific Applet, identified by its AID. The presence of such an Applet is verified by trying to open a channel to this Applet. The opened channel, if any, is closed before the end of the isMatching method.

      • SERecognizerByAID

        public SERecognizerByAID(byte[] aid)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes a new instance of the SERecognizerByAID class.
        Parameters:
        aid - The expected AID.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the length of AID is not between AID_MIN_LENGTH and AID_MAX_LENGTH or if it's null.

    • Method Detail

      • isMatching

        public boolean isMatching(Session session)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Tries to open a channel with the specified AID.
        Specified by:
        isMatching in class SERecognizer
        Parameters:
        session - The session in which to open the channel.
        Returns:
        true if the channel could be opened, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the used session is null.
